en: HOW EASY TO RETURN YOUR DELUXERIE ORDER?
Please read carefully our return policy by clicking here.
Find the order and select the items that you want to return by filling out an online return form below.
Please give us some details about your return in next steps of the online return form.

Select your return shipping method.
(We are offering paid shipping label with the discounted prices or you can send the order back at your expense with the any courier you want.Shipment labels is free for the store credit returns

(IF APPLICABLE): Select your payment method for your return shipment.
(If you have choose paid shipment method then you can pay the shipping amount online or also you can select the deduction from your order amount)

(IF APPLICABLE): Print shipping label and stamp it to the return package.
(Printing and stamping shipping label on the package is not mandatory for all couriers you can check the instructions after get the label online)
Prepare your return package and drop-off at the nearest parcel shop.
Your return will be processed in 14 days after delivered to the our warehouse.
We have found your order. Please select item(s) and return reasons below.
oops, No order found, please check your email address and order number

locale: Was there a hygiene seal on the packaging of the item?
en: Was there a hygiene seal on the packaging of the item?

locale: Click here to return this product.
en: Click here to return this product.
Exchange (Earn 100 Deluxerie Points for your next purchase: valued 5€)
You can drop-off your return package to the nearest HOMERR location.
You can drop-off your return package to the nearest UPS AccessPoint.
Your return package will be collected by the GLS from desired address and date.
Your return package will be collected by the GLS from desired address and date.
You can pay online with the various payment methods for your return shipping label.
With this method we can deduct the return shipping amount from your refund amount.

We have received your return request and payment for the return shipping label.
							You can download your return shipment label by the clicking the button below. 
							Your return details and shipping label also will be sent as an e-mail to you.
							lease check your spam-box in case that you didn’t received.
CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD YOUR SHIPPING LABEL
It may take up to 10 business days to process your return, after the your package has been reached us.
